title: Man of Steel Reconstructed 3D (2014) Fan Edit 1080p Bluray HSBS
description:
This is not the official edit of the movie. This is a Fan Edit.
 <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0770828/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0770828/</a>

This is the exact same cut as the 2D release. 
The only difference is that it's in 3D half side by side.

This edit is for people who already liked the movie. It removes some of the
over-the-top scenes and unnecessary action sequences. If you are a Transformers fan
and enjoy things getting smashed, this edit is not for you.

Removed 11 mins.
